favourite.article: Lord we repent and now return. Lord remind us that You alone will do!
Nothing and no one can satisfy me but You anymore. Jesus, I love You, my only desire. Oh, set my heart on fire.
Only You alone will do. I can't make it without You. Keep me close to You, Just joined to You as one.

Nothing and no one can satisfy us besides the Lord. No matter how far we've gone astray, we will always be drawn back to this One, who is our best love and first love. Everyone and everything is temporal and will let us down, but the Lord will never, He has been with us since the beginning and continues to be with us everyday :)
Just one touch of Jesus is enough to cause us to fall in love with Him! Lord Jesus! Let us touch You!
Nothing and no one can satisfy me but You anymore! Jesus my first love and Jesus my best love, I love You! I just love You!
Jesus my first love! My best love!
I love to listen this song. When my younger brother tag it to me, my tears won't stop falling. Jesus my first love, oh Jesus my best love. Nothing can satisfy me...
Oh, Lord Jesus, we love You so much!!! Release us all to enjoy the Triune God! Lord Jesus, we love You dearly. Amen!
Yes, Lord. Nothing and no one can satisfy me. but only You can satisfy me. You're my final choice.

Just one touch of You dear Lord. You are all we need! Jesus, turning to You is what I need. There is nothing in the whole universe that compares to You. Prepare Thy bride, Thy church... Oh, Lord how we need You! May our spirit burn for Your heart's desire! Lord, thank You! I just love You!

Nothing and no one can satisfy me but You anymore. Jesus, I love You, my only desire. Oh, set my heart on fire.
Only you can satisfy me Lord. Fill me to the brim. Amen
I repent and now return to the Lord! from many distractions. Yes, our dear Lord is the very best.

i really love this song so much ... it only proves to us that we can never be satisfied in any pleasures ... only Christ is our real satisfaction ... WE MUST GIVE TO HIM OUR WHOLE BEING AND MUST GIVE OUR VERY BEST JUST FOR HIM ... the Lord Jesus Christ must be our fist and best love ... he is not comparable at all ...
Only the Lord can satisfy us. Lord, cause me to always behold You, to hear Your voice. Continue to touch us.
Lord, we just love You!!! You are all we need. I love You, my dearest Lord!!
I cannot stop my tear when singing this hymn. Oh, my dearest Lord, only You can satisfy me,I present myself again to You.
NOTHING AND NO ONE CAN SATISFY ME BUT ONLY THE LORD JESUS!!! AMEN.....

Praise the Lord! I sang this song before. Bro. Higashi really enjoyed the fellowship between him and the Lord. I had sung this hymn in Chinese version. Every time I sing this hymn, I can't help to express my feeling in tear.
>This song recovered me from losing my first love to Him. I'm realy touched especially the last stanza bacause it shows me that repenting is the way to recover my first love. Lord, I lOVE You!!!!
Thank the Lord for this hymn, I love it. Lord, I love You, thank You that I can turn to You and repent, and thank You for Your forgiveness. Lord, keep grant my heart and burn to You.
I love You too Lord Jesus! Just one touch of You brings me to ecstacy!

I really love this song. It makes me remember my initial salvation, how the Lord touched me, and how sweetly He gazed at me! I want to experience Him moment by moment. I love You too, dear Lord Jesus!

I love it so much, especially the last stanza, which is really a good expression of my inner feeling toward the Lord. O Lord, yes I repent and now return. Grant my heart for You to burn. And burn for You forever and ever from now on with all the saints around the whole universe. Lord, praise You!
I really love this song! This song burn my love to the Lord again. Praise the Lord! I love Him because He first love me. His love draw me to Him. He is the only one can satisfy me!
Truly, no one can ever love us the way the Lord does! His love is the best love in this world! O, Lord, I want to thank You, for coming into my life...please stay, and keep me.

Truly, nothing and no one can satisfy me. Lord Jesus, You are my deepest satisfaction. Keep us always repenting and returning always to You. Lord, You are my first, best and ONLY love. I love You. Amen!

i enjoyed this much with the brothers and sisters...with all the pain&hurt i feel its God compassion that touches me to always have faith on him in whatever circumstances in life...i dearly sumbit myself to you Oh Lord...Amen...
Solo un toque del Seor......gracias Seor por este sitio, y gracias por los penatagramas.......
I love this song....
This song makes me returnig to my Father and spirit. LORD! I love You more and more. I'm a man who can not live without You.
we should always take Christ as the Head!!Oh, how we need to touch Him everyaday!!
The Lord truly satisfies us in every way. Nothing in this world could give us true satisfaction. Only the Lord Jesus. Amen.

This is one of my favorite songs. When I hear it, it tells me to just turn to my spirit, and touch the Lord! And that He is our only satisfaction, not the world because it bores us sometimes. Oh, I just want to receive the Lord more each day, and to follow His lead!
I was listening to the songs one day and I came to this song and I enjoyed it very much.
I like it because its very nice to hear.

I was in the office when suddenly I felt so downhearted because of too many problems puzzeling me, I silenced for awhile, I remembered my friend's adviseâto surf hymnal.net. I opened this one.I believed it is the Lord who enlightened everything for me through this song, He consoled and comforted me today!!! Praise HIm!! O Lord Jesus, you are my Lord! You are the One who fills my all in all! I LOVE YOU VERY MUCH! AMEN!
